properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued January 14 at 2:10AM PST until January 16 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 35 to 45 kt with gusts
up to 55 kt and seas 15 to 20 ft at 13 seconds expected. For the
Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep and hazardous seas 15 to 20
ft at 13 seconds expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, west
winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 12 to 16 ft at
13 seconds.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 7 AM to 10 PM PST Wednesday.
For the Hazardous Seas Warning, from 10 PM Wednesday to 4 AM
PST Thursday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 AM PST
Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid strong winds and very steep
seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 10 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM WEDNESDAY TO 4 AM PST THURSDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IS CANCELLED
